name: Santa's vacation
description: Collect New Year's toys and gifts, fight off your opponents and outstrip them. Compare the results with other players. It’s fun! Win and become Super-Crazy-Santa!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 или AMD FX-8120 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1 Gb or AMD  HD 6850 1 Gb Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Core i3-4170 или AMD FX-8300 + Storage: 1 GB available space
